original: 吳郡烏程人，嚴白虎之弟。孫策下江東時，嚴白虎不敵孫策，遣嚴輿至孫策處求和。孫策於席上擊殺以勇力聞名的嚴輿，嚴白虎一眾聽聞後驚慌無以。
text: Wujun Wucheng, the younger brother of Yan Baihu. When Sun Ce went to Jiangdong, Yan Baihu lost to Sun Ce and sent Yan Yu to Sun Ce to seek peace. Sun Ce killed Yan Yu, who was known for his bravery, and Yan Baihu all panicked after hearing this.
